name: Chaos Cat
description:
You are the chaos cat.  Bringer of destruction and gross cat pukes.

Your owner has stepped out and it is your job to eat some food and puke on as many objects as possible (at least 5).  Bring forth misery and mild frustration as you ruin your owners day!

  • Use the arrow keys to walk
  • Use the mouse to look around
  • Use left mouse to eat food
  • Use enter to puke

The game ends when you run out of pukes.
